AdvancedLab.name: Advanced Lab
AdvancedLab.effect: Skill bonus for analysis and research

AdvancedNavComputer.name: Advanced Nav Computer
AdvancedNavComputer.effect: Adds +2 for traveling familiar spike courses

AmphibiousOperation.name: Amphibious Operation
AmphibiousOperation.effect: Can land and can operate under water

Armory.name: Armory
Armory.effect: Weapons and armor for the crew

AtmosphericConfiguration.name: Atmospheric Configuration
AtmosphericConfiguration.effect: Can land: frigates and fighters only.

AutotargetingSystem.name: Auto-targeting System
AutotargetingSystem.effect: Fires one weapon system without a gunner

AutomationSupport.name: Automation Support
AutomationSupport.effect: Ship can use simple robots as crew

BoardingTubes.name: Boarding Tubes
BoardingTubes.effect: Allows boarding of a hostile disabled ship

ColonyCore.name: Colony Core
ColonyCore.effect: Ship can be deconstructed into a colony base

SpikeDrive1.name: Spike Drive-1
SpikeDrive1.effect: All hulls come with this by default

SpikeDrive2.name: Spike Drive-2
SpikeDrive2.effect: Upgrade a spike drive to drive-2 rating

SpikeDrive3.name: Spike Drive-3
SpikeDrive3.effect: Upgrade a spike drive to drive-3 rating

SpikeDrive4.name: Spike Drive-4
SpikeDrive4.effect: Upgrade a spike drive to drive-4 rating

SpikeDrive5.name: Spike Drive-5
SpikeDrive5.effect: Upgrade a spike drive to drive-5 rating

SpikeDrive6.name: Spike Drive-6
SpikeDrive6.effect: Upgrade a spike drive to drive-6 rating

EmissionsDampers.name: Emissions Dampers
EmissionsDampers.effect: Adds +2 to skill checks to avoid detection

ExodusBay.name: Exodus Bay
ExodusBay.effect: House vast numbers of cold sleep passengers

ExtendedMedbay.name: Extended Medbay
ExtendedMedbay.effect: Can provide medical care to more patients

ExtendedStores.name: Extended Stores
ExtendedStores.effect: Maximum life support duration is doubled

FuelBunkers.name: Fuel Bunkers
FuelBunkers.effect: Adds fuel for one more drill between fuelings

FuelScoops.name: Fuel Scoops
FuelScoops.effect: Ship can scoop fuel from a gas giant or star

Lifeboats.name: Lifeboats
Lifeboats.effect: Emergency escape craft for a ship's crew

LuxuryCabins.name: Luxury Cabins
LuxuryCabins.effect: 10% of the max crew get luxurious quarters

PrecognitiveNavChamber.name: Precognitive Nav Chamber
PrecognitiveNavChamber.effect: Allows a precog to assist in navigation

PsionicAnchorpoint.name: Psionic Anchorpoint
PsionicAnchorpoint.effect: Focal point for allied psychics' powers

SensorMask.name: Sensor Mask
SensorMask.effect: At long distances, disguise ship as another

ShiptenderMount.name: Shiptender Mount
ShiptenderMount.effect: Allow another ship to hitch on a spike drive

SmugglersHold.name: Smuggler's Hold
SmugglersHold.effect: Small amount of well-hidden cargo space

SystemDrive.name: System Drive
SystemDrive.effect: Replace spike drive with small system drive

TeleportationPads.name: Teleportation Pads
TeleportationPads.effect: Pretech teleportation to and from ship

TractorBeams.name: Tractor Beams
TractorBeams.effect: Manipulate objects in space at a distance

VehicleTransportFittings.name: Vehicle Transport Fittings
VehicleTransportFittings.effect: Halve tonnage space of carried vehicles
